text: Morbius is a 2022 American superhero movie based on the Marvel Comics character Morbius. The movie is produced by Columbia Pictures in association with Marvel and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing. It is the third movie in Sony's Spider-Man Universe. It was directed by Daniel Epsinosa. It was released in the United States on April 1, 2022. It received negative reviews from critics and did not do well at the box office. ==Cast== * Jared Leto as Dr. Michael Morbius * Matt Smith as Milo Morbius * Jared Harris * Tyrese Gibson as Simon Stroud * Michael Keaton as Adrian Toomes / Vulture Category:2022 action movies Category:2022 horror movies Category:2020s American action movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:American superhero movies Category:Movies set in the 2020s Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in Greece Category:Movies set in Central America Category:Movies about scientists Category:Vampires in movies Category:Sony's Spider-Man Universe movies
title: Morbius (movie)
